titles.title: Citizen Representative Act Go Home Provision
To provide for the adjournment of Congress by September 30th each year.

bill.summary: 3/31/1993--Introduced. Citizen Representative Act Go Home Provision - Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to prohibit compensation of a Member of Congress for service after September 30 of a year and before January 3 of the succeeding year unless such service follows the sine die adjournment of the last regular session of the Congress which began before the start of that period.
